item.title: Installing Kubedge Blinkt
item.description: Install Kubedge Blinkt Application on the PI Cluster

item.title: Installing Kubedge Kubeplay
item.description: Install simplistic Kubeplay Application on the PI Cluster. It is a primitiv golang based server which get the user to go through the entire DevOps process (to build the docker image) and deploy it using Helm on Kubedge.
